bibl.title: Letter from Howard A. Kelly to Emilie Lawrence Reed, May 12, 1928

div1.p: Kelly thanks Emilie Lawrence Reed for a memento of Walter Reed. He notes a greater appreciation of Walter Reed's work.

div1.head: Letter from Howard A. Kelly to Emilie Lawrence Reed, May 12, 1928

opener.dateline:
HOWARD A. KELLY, M. D.
LIBRARY
1406 EUTAW PLACE, BALTIMORE, MD.
CABLE ADDRESS, “HAKELLY” BALTIMORE
May 12, 1928.

div1.p:
I appreciate very much the
memento establishing another
link with my dear friend and recalling memories
of happy days that have passed. I am going
to put the paper cutter right on my desk and
make good use of it. Is it not interesting
to see how the country at large is taking more
and more interest in Doctor Reed's work.
